title: Blinkbolt
data:
{{version030}}

'''Blinkbolt''' is a monster-only spell which transforms the caster into a bolt of lightning, blasting its way through targets and depositing the caster wherever the spell's range ends. As with any [[electricity]] damage spell, it can be reflected off of rock or stone [[wall]]s, allowing for [[multizap]]s, but metal and green crystal walls end the spell's range early.

Players receive Blinkbolt as an ability while in [[Storm Form]].

{{monsters with spell}}

==History==
*Blinkbolt was added in [[0.14]].
